meanings.definition: A band of fabric worn around the head to absorb sweat during physical activity.
meanings.sent1: During the game, the basketball player wore sweatbands on his head.
meanings.sent2: She always wears sweatbands when she goes jogging to keep sweat out of her eyes.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that wearing sweatbands makes you look like a superhero with a secret power.
meanings.sent4: The sweatbands on his head were like loyal soldiers, protecting him from the enemy sweat.
meanings.sent5: The bright red sweatbands stood out against his dark hair, a beacon of determination.

meanings.definition: Bands of fabric worn around the wrists to absorb sweat during physical activity.
meanings.sent1: The tennis player wore sweatbands on his wrists to keep his hands dry.
meanings.sent2: She bought new sweatbands to match her workout outfit.
meanings.sent3: The sweatbands on his wrists were like tiny towels, always ready to wipe away sweat.
meanings.sent4: Her sweatbands were like loyal companions, never leaving her side during exercise.
meanings.sent5: The colorful sweatbands added a fun pop to her workout attire.
